name: Crime City Chase Sim
description:
Drive an amazing, super charged, police bikes. You are the police it’s your duty to stop the bank robbers. Crime City Chase Sim is an exciting city sheriff heavy bike driving simulator game. You can drive the police motor-bike in heavy traffic to perform exciting, amazing ride. Your job as a traffic police officer is to secretly chase & arrest the city gangsters to be the best police motorbike driver. Play now

Features:
• Police Bike Gangster squad Car Chasing Missions
• Extreme Thrilling and Challenging Missions
• Interesting Game Play in Amazing City Environment
• Smooth and Intuitive Controls of Police Heavy Bike
• Stunning & High Quality 3d Graphics with Amazing Sounds
